跨る: (またがる) - to extend over/to extend into; to straddle

路導: (みちおしえ) - tiger beetle (esp. the Japanese tiger beetle, Cicindela japonica)

跳ね: (hane) - (a) jump; splashes (uso de lama) , (a) jump; splashes (usu. of mud); upward turn at the bottom (e.g. of a vertical stroke of a kanji or of a hairdo); close (e.g. of a theatrical performance), breakup

跳ね上がり: (はねあがり) - jumping/jump (e.g. in prices); rashness/rash person

跳ね上がる: (haneagaru) - to jump up, to spring up; to jump (mercado, preço, etc.), to rise sharply, to skyrocket , to jump up, to spring up; to jump (market, price, etc.), to rise sharply, to skyrocket; to act rashly, to jump the gun
跳ね上げる: (はねあげる) - to churn up/to strike up/to throw up; to tip up/to flip up

跳ね上り: (はねあがり) - jumping/jump (e.g. in prices); rashness/rash person
跳ね上る: (はねあがる) - to jump up/to spring up; to jump (market, price, etc.)/to rise sharply/to skyrocket; to act rashly/to jump the gun

跳ね出る: (はねでる) - to spring or rush out

跳ね返す: (はねかえす) - to reject/to repulse/to repel; to bounce back/to counterattack/to strike back

跳ね除ける: (はねのける) - to push aside; to brush or thrust aside; to remove; to get rid of

跳び: (とび) - flying/leaping/flight/leap; (when reading a number aloud) naught/zero/oh; flying fish (esp. the Japanese flying fish, Cypselurus agoo); (飛び only) {mahj} running out of points (zero or fewer)/game ending due to a player running out of points

跳び乗る: (とびのる) - to jump upon (a moving object)
跳び付く: (とびつく) - to jump at; to be attracted by
跳び出す: (とびだす) - to jump out/to rush out/to fly out; to appear (suddenly); to protrude/to project; to butt in
跳び出る: (とびでる) - to project/to protrude/to pop out (e.g. eyes); to jump out/to rush out

跳び降りる: (とびおりる) - to jump down; to jump off; to jump from; to jump out of
